item.description:
New London County Chapter of the Holistic Moms Network will be meeting on the first Monday of each month at LYSB, 7 pm.

The Holistic Moms Network is a non-profit organization connecting parents who are interested in holistic health and green living. Founded in 2003, today HMN has more than 120 chapters across North America. HMN encourages families to parent from the heart, trust their instincts, and to live naturally.

Some topics of interest previously enjoyed at HMN meetings throughout the state have included information on Acupuncture, Raw Food Workshop, Self-Defense Workshop, Mindfulness, Composting, Baby wearing, and Extended Breastfeeding. What topics are of interest to you? For more information on joining this organization, please visit http://www.holisticmoms.orgÂ or drop by the monthly meeting at LYSB.
item.name: Holistic Moms Network - New London County, Ct. Chapter
